title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Bravado Greenwood
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the Bravado Greenwood (Muscle) for free through June 24.

With the potential for a Missile Lock-On Jammer, Remote Control Unit, Slick Mines and Armor Plating, the Bravado Greenwood brings you old-school tastes, old-school muscle, old-school diplomacy, and new-school know-how.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
